title: Cascade
desc:
- Playable off of 🌊, <:blue:1106234079055200378>, and ❄️
- Each starting hand may only have up to one 🌊 card.
- When you play a 🌊 card on your turn, you may follow it up with any number of additional 🌊 cards, including any you just drew as a result of playing cards.
- If you try to play a ⚡ card alongside a 🌊 card, or a card that has both colors at once, you will be electrocuted and forced to draw two non-⚡ non-🌊 cards.
